title: Those government TikTok ‘bans’ hardly ban anything
description: Despite tough talk from U.S. officials, TikTok bans have been toothless so far. Proposed national security restrictions of the app are stuck, too. Now what?

title: The most anticipated video games of 2023
description: Across PlayStation, Xbox, PC and Nintendo Switch, here are the games we're most looking forward to in 2023.

title: Microsoft set to battle FTC over $68.7 billion Activision Blizzard deal
description: Microsoft wants to buy Activision, the maker of hit video games like Call of Duty. Regulators oppose what could be the largest acquisition in the gaming industry.
